about damn time someone uploaded the US version of this.

The UK version was pissing me off.

Already installed all of it. Mounted the Play Disk with Daemon Tools but I was still unable to open it, still receiving the pop-up message 'cannot locate the SimCity 4 Deluxe play disk and I should insert it, select OK and restart the game.'?

What should I do?

made it to work...

1. mount the two image files, i used alcohol on disk 1 and daemon tools on disk 2, 

2. install

3. open the mounted disk 1, when the menu appears, don't click anything. open the mounted disk 2, then click play
